nodes.text: A Life Day tree was a decorated wroshyr tree traditionally associated with the Wookiee celebration of Life Day. Because wroshyrs reached kilometers in height in their adult years, younger specimens were chosen as Life Day trees so they could be kept inside a house. They were typically festooned with tinsel and red baubles.
A holographic version of the tree was sold in markets for Life Day.
The Life Day tree is a Wookiee equivalent of the real-life Christmas tree.
